review: I got Chromecast since our family recently dropped our cable service and opted for Netflix as an alternative. Given the great reviews and after a little research, I decided to give this a try. Setting it up was super simple. It comes with a Micro USB cable and that is used to power it. Everything to use it is in there. I only needed the cable itself and connected to the TV's USB port and power it that way. After that was done, I was able to cast YouTube and Netflix from my iPhone to the living room TV.The cool thing about this is that it's not tied to a single TV. I moved it to my room and I was able to cast YouTube off of my computer, working just as well as in the living room. My parents loved it, I ordered another one so they could have it in their room and it works great. This is an awesome little device.It does get hot after being used and it is normal, according to the instruction manual. Just like the manual says, I disconnect the power and let it sit for a bit after I'm done using it before putting it away.
